title.value: V2 Table Code System: Pricing Tier Level

description.value: The domain of possible values describing the declared level of pricing for a particular product under a contract, usually based on a discount for larger orders under the contract – often assigned numerically, e.g.: • Tier 1 • Tier 2 • Tier 3

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0966 (Pricing Tier Level)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
